channel.title: Full inventory & Coins
channel.description: Lets see we have 100k coins, and we have a full inventory, I get told to make space before picking it up, I want it to just add to the pile, where would I go to fix it?

item.title: Full inventory & Coins
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ProjectDarkSouls, post:4, topic:550564”]My bad,

Okay so you are correct.

27 items in inventory with coins
You are pking, have an invent full of food and some cash, in order to pickup the cash, I need to eat my food, and when having 1 space free, pick up the coins.[/quote]
So, now tell us more about your source? Is it 317, 474, 508, 525, 562, 602, 666, 667, 718, 734, 800+, etc.

Provide us with related code, as well.

And it helps to show that you’re actually trying to fix this. Instead of just posting “Hey I have a problem how do I fix it”, show that you’ve made some initiative to fix it yourself. Tell us what you’ve tried and etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Full inventory & Coins
item.dc:creator: @ProjectDarkSouls ProjectDarkSouls
item.description:
@ProjectDarkSouls wrote:

My bad,

Okay so you are correct.

27 items in inventory with coins
You are pking, have an invent full of food and some cash, in order to pickup the cash, I need to eat my food, and when having 1 space free, pick up the coins.

item.title: Full inventory & Coins
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Is the item you want to be added to a pile a stackable item? In which case you would need to make it a stackable item

Looks like what OP is asking is this:
Player has coins in inventory.
Player also has all other 27 slots full with other items and etc.
Player attempts to receive coins (Was not specified HOW they’re getting the coins, via picking up or a skill reward or etc etc).
Player gets message saying inventory is full, even though the coins can stack on the ones in inventory.

and the issue is that he wants to be able to get the coins even though it’s “full”
[hr]
OP, we need more information. Please read the first link in my signature and then edit your post. It will really help us help you

Read full topic
